titleStmt.title: Knowing the great abuses many have met with, languishing under this allamode disease, and for want of cure have been totally ruined; I have made it my business in my studies and practice, to find out a means more effectual than the common ways, which by God's assistance, with my endeavours, I have attained to a most expeditious, safe, and easie method, by which I infallibly cure the venereal pox or clap, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
